item.description:
Winterfest returns to Lowell, the fireworks will be at 5:30 this year. If we meet around 3 we can walk around a bit or go into Club Celcius to have a beer and listen to the music. After the fireworks, if people are interested, we could go to dinner...suggestions for a location are welcome. Last year I believe some went to Athenian Corner. We could try that or Mambo Grill, the Brewery???

Music schedule for Saturday is below.
Club Celsius Live Music Schedule:
3 PM - 5 PM — Band: More lively music TBA!
After 6 PM: Club Celsius is 21+ only, $5 cover charge. Location: Arcand Drive
(7:30 PM - 11:45 PM — Jim Plunkett – Fun, classic songs that get you dancing!
I am sure Jeane will want to go back to "give it up" for Jim Plunkett! LOL)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Lowell Winterfest
